original_title: まじめにふまじめ かいけつゾロリ なぞのお宝大 さくせん
overview: Ishishi, and Noshishi help out Tail find a treasure her father Gale died trying to figure out. Along the way, they are helped out by Yōkai-sensei and several monsters, but Tiger and his crew stand in their way.
title: Zorori the Naughty Hero: Quest For The Mysterious Treasure
